title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.4 - Entering toll booths, offices; loitering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.4 - Entering toll booths, offices; loitering

State Regulations

No person without proper authority or permission of the
superintendent shall enter the toll collector's booth or office of the
commission, or loiter upon the bridges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
655.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
